text: The 1915–16 RPI men's ice hockey season was the 13th season of play for the program. ==Season== Rensselaer ended the team's losing streak at 9 games and later earned the first win for the program in over four years. Note: Rensselaer's athletic teams were unofficially known as 'Cherry and White' until 1921 when the Engineers moniker debuted for the men's basketball team. ==Roster== ==Standings== ==Schedule and Results== |- !colspan=12 style=";" | Regular Season ==References== Category:RPI Engineers men's ice hockey seasons RPI RPI Category:1915 in sports in New York (state) Category:1916 in sports in New York (state)
title: 1915–16 RPI men's ice hockey season
